name: Geum Silver Leaf
description:
This fine silver leaf has an unusual round shape. Leaf measures approximately 30mm by 20mm. Each of these pendants are as unique as the leaves they come from.

This leaf pendant captures the simple beauty of nature. Although they look delicate each leaf has been hardened and polished to ensure that they are strong.

This design comes with a 16" sterling silver necklace (an 18" necklace can be provided instead, on request). You can see how naturally the pendants hang in the example photograph provided.

Each necklace is beautifully presented in a simple stylish case and individually sewn envelope. Each envelope is made personally by me from vintage cloth and buttons to give a unique finish and presentation (see example image).

name: Gemstone Ring
description:
These sterling silver and semi precious gemstone rings are simple and elegant to wear.
Each ring is approximately 1cm in width and is hand-textured to give the band interest and warmth. 
The pictured ring contains an amethyst but is available in a range of gemstones.

Please email me your ring size.

Each ring is beautifully presented in a simple stylish case and individually sewn envelope. Each envelope is made personally by me from vintage cloth and buttons to give a unique finish and presentation (see image 2 for example).

name: Viburnum Leaf
description:
This leaf pendant captures the simple beauty of nature. 

The fine detail of the leaf is beautifully represented giving a tactile, decorative finish. Each pendant is as unique as the leaf it comes from and although they look delicate each leaf has been hardened and polished to ensure that they are strong.

This leaf measures approximately 47mm by 35mm.

This design comes with a 16" sterling silver necklace (an 18" necklace can be provided instead, on request). You can see how naturally the pendants hang in the example photograph provided.

Each necklace is beautifully presented in a simple stylish case and individually sewn envelope. Each envelope is made personally by me from vintage cloth and buttons to give a unique finish and presentation (see example image).

name: Glimpse of Nature Charm Bangles
description:
The beauty of nature is captured in this leaf charm bangle, featuring a fine silver hedgerow leaf and smokey quartz gemstone beads.
The leaves are picked from my hedgerow and and the silver is applied to the back of the leaf, the lead then burns away in the kiln. They are then attached to these delicate sterling silver bangles.


Either purchase an individual bangle or add two textured bracelets for increased impact.

These are delicate bangles with a metal thickness of 1.5mm and have an internal diameter of 65cm, though if you email me on purchase, larger sizes can be made.

options.name: Trio of bracelets one with charms

name: Charlotte's Web
description:
This delicate silver pendent reminds me of a spiders web glistening on a dewy morning.
The silver is first textured by hand before being wound around itself to form this pendent.
Sold with a 16" silver curb chain, please email me if you would like this swapped for an 18"chain.

Matching earrings are available.

name: Birdsong
description:
This silver pendant features a simple bird design with a series of three simple hearts, as though he is singing to you.

This pendant comes with a 16" sterling silver necklace (an 18" necklace can be provided instead, on request). You can see how naturally the pendants hang in the example photograph provided.

Each necklace is beautifully presented in a simple stylish case and individually sewn envelope. Each envelope is made personally by me from vintage cloth and buttons to give a unique finish and presentation (see example image).

name: Silver Grape
description:
In a sunny spot of my garden I have a grape climbing its way to the sun - not only does it produce lovely grapes but it has the most delicate leaves. These pendants are made from the youngest of these leaves.

Whilst looking delicate these fine silver pendants are worked hardened and then polished so they not only sparkle beautifully in the light but are also very strong.

The fine detail of the leaf is beautifully represented giving a tactile, decorative finish.

This design comes with a 16" sterling silver necklace (an 18" necklace can be provided instead, on request). You can see how naturally the pendants hang in the example photograph provided.

Each necklace is beautifully presented in a simple stylish case and individually sewn envelope. Each envelope is made personally by me from vintage cloth and buttons to give a unique finish and presentation (see example image).

name: Token of Love Bangle Trio
description:
This bangle makes a beautiful gift to yourself or a loved one. Featuring a fine silver textured heart and a rose quartz heart and bead. 

Either purchase an individual bangle or add two textured bracelets for increased impact.

These are delicate bangles with a metal thickness of 1.5mm and have an internal diameter of 65cm, though if you email me on purchase, larger sizes can be made.

You can also have the colour of the stones replaced with for example Smokey Quartz or Amethyst. Email me if you have a particular gemstone in mind.

name: Flowering currant
description:
These pendants are made from a flowering currant at the bottom of the garden. Although they don't produce any fruit they have lovely pink flowers and leaves that produce an intricate design.

These pendants may look as delicate as the leaves they come from but they have been work hardened and polished to ensure that not only do they shine in the light but they are also strong.

Each leaf is as individual as the leaves they come from.

This design comes with a 16" sterling silver necklace (an 18" necklace can be provided instead, on request). You can see how naturally the pendants hang in the example photograph provided.

Each necklace is beautifully presented in a simple stylish case and individually sewn envelope. Each envelope is made personally by me from vintage cloth and buttons to give a unique finish and presentation (see example image).

name: Wild Hedgerow
description:
Hedgerows are a diversity of wildlife and interest. These leaves are picked from the hedgerow at the bottom of my garden before being encapsulated in fine silver. Each leaf pendant is intricately detailed with the veins from the underside of the leaf and glistens in the light. Each of these pendants are as unique as the leaves they come from and although they look delicate each leaf has been hardened and polished to ensure that they are strong.

This design comes with a 16" sterling silver necklace (an 18" necklace can be provided instead, on request). You can see how naturally the pendants hang in the example photograph provided.

Each necklace is beautifully presented in a simple stylish case and individually sewn envelope. Each envelope is made personally by me from vintage cloth and buttons to give a unique finish and presentation (see example image).

name: Looped Bracelet
description:
This simple but effective bracelet is made from textured sterling silver. 

Each bracelet is hand textured and have a diameter of 65cm. The simple opening and closing mechanism makes them an ideal choice for people who hate trying to fit their hand through static bracelets.

Each bracelet is presented in a fabric envelope made personally by me from vintage cloth and buttons to give a unique finish and presentation (see example image).

name: Sycamore
description:
I have an old and incredibly large Sycamore tree which produces little saplings all over my garden. I use these young leaves to produce these simple leaf pendants.

Although not as deeply veined as some of the other leaves on my site their beauty is in their interesting shape. 

Please remember that these pendants are made from real leaves and are therefore as diverse as the nature they come from.

This design comes with a 16" sterling silver necklace (an 18" necklace can be provided instead, on request). You can see how naturally the pendants hang in the example photograph provided.

Each necklace is beautifully presented in a simple stylish case and individually sewn envelope. Each envelope is made personally by me from vintage cloth and buttons to give a unique finish and presentation (see example image).

name: Heart Impressions - Patterned
description:
A unique heart design, using clean and simple lines in fine silver to create a beautiful pendant. Each heart is textured using a pattern inspired by nature. 

Each heart is individually crafted and unique.
Approximately 25mm in size.

This pendant comes with a 16" sterling silver necklace (an 18" necklace can be provided instead, on request). You can see how naturally the pendant hangs in the example photograph provided.

Each necklace is beautifully presented in a simple stylish case and individually sewn envelope. Each envelope is made personally by me from vintage cloth and buttons to give a unique finish and presentation (see image 3 for example).

name: Lemon Geranium
description:
I came across these leaves when out with my son. Not only are they a beautiful shape but they release a heady lemon scent when working with them.

Each pendant is as individual as the leaves they are made from and although they look delicate they have been work hardened and polished to not only make them shine but also to last.

This design comes with a 16" sterling silver necklace (an 18" necklace can be provided instead, on request). You can see how naturally the pendants hang in the example photograph provided.

Each necklace is beautifully presented in a simple stylish case and individually sewn envelope. Each envelope is made personally by me from vintage cloth and buttons to give a unique finish and presentation (see example image).

name: Smokey Heart
description:
A unique heart design, using clean and simple lines in fine silver to create a beautiful pendant. The heart is textured using a pattern inspired by nature, perfectly offset by gemstone beads.  We have a range of beads available that can be combined with our heart design, including most birthstones - please just ask.

Each heart is individually crafted and unique.
Approximately 25mm in size.

This pendant comes with a 16" sterling silver necklace (an 18" necklace can be provided instead, on request). You can see how naturally the pendant hangs in the example photograph provided.

Each necklace is beautifully presented in a simple stylish case and individually sewn envelope. Each envelope is made personally by me from vintage cloth and buttons to give a unique finish and presentation (see image 3 for example).

name: Heart Reflections
description:
A unique heart design, using clean and simple lines in fine silver to create a beautiful pendant. Each heart is textured using a pattern inspired by nature.

Each heart is individually crafted and unique.

Each necklace is beautifully presented in a simple stylish case and individually sewn envelope. Each envelope is made personally by me from vintage cloth and buttons to give a unique finish and presentation (see image 3 for example).

name: Winter Jasmine Leaf
description:
This leaf pendant captures the simple beauty of nature. 

It was created by applying several layers of art clay silver to a real leaf and then firing it in a kiln to leave a beautiful fine silver piece, original and unique as the leaf it came from.

The fine detail of the leaf is beautifully represented giving a tactile, decorative finish. Although they look delicate each leaf has been hardened and polished to ensure that they are strong

This pendant comes with a 16" sterling silver necklace (an 18" necklace can be provided instead, on request). 

Each necklace is beautifully presented in a simple stylish case and individually sewn envelope. Each envelope is made personally by me from vintage cloth and buttons to give a unique finish and presentation (see image 2 for example)

Note: each pendant varies with the leaf it is created from so size and shape will differ

This leaf pendant captures the simple beauty of nature.

The fine detail of the leaf is beautifully represented giving a tactile, decorative finish. Each of these pendants are as unique as the leaves they come from and although they look delicate each leaf has been hardened and polished to ensure that they are strong

This necklace is 16" in size but can be replaced with an 18" sizem on request. You can see how naturally the pendant hangs in the example photograph provided.

This pendant comes with a beaded 16" sterling silver necklace (an 18" necklace can be provided instead, on request). 

Each necklace is beautifully presented in a simple stylish case and individually sewn envelope. Each envelope is made personally by me from vintage cloth and buttons to give a unique finish and presentation (see image 3 for example).

The fine detail of the leaf is beautifully represented giving a tactile, decorative finish, perfectly offset by the round grey quartz bead necklace.

name: Dewdrops entwined
description:
A unique patterned design, using clean and simple lines in fine silver to create a beautiful pendant duo. Each pendant is unique, using a pattern inspired by nature. The faceted green adventurine beads perfectly compliment the nature design.

This pendant comes with a beaded 16" sterling silver necklace (an 18" necklace can be provided instead, on request). 

Each necklace is beautifully presented in a simple stylish case and individually sewn envelope. Each envelope is made personally by me from vintage cloth and buttons to give a unique finish and presentation (see image 3 for example).

name: Japanese Anemone
description:
This leaf is from the border in my garden. It has a lovely lopsided effect and hangs wonderfully on a chain. 
The deep veins add wonderful detail to this fine silver pendant and help it to sparkle when polished.
Although these leaves look delicate they have been work hardened in my polisher and are great for everyday wear or for that special occasion.
This design comes with a 16" sterling silver necklace (an 18" necklace can be provided instead, on request). You can see how naturally the pendants hang in the example photograph provided.

Each necklace is beautifully presented in a simple stylish case and individually sewn envelope. Each envelope is made personally by me from vintage cloth and buttons to give a unique finish and presentation (see example image).
